Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has begun building three massive lines of d...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has begun building three massive lines of defenses in the Zaporozhye and Dnepr regions to defend against attacks from the east.Ukrainian authorities claim the first line is almost complete, satellite imagery confirms their claim. The first line runs along the Donbass borders. A second line is being built from Pokrovskoe to Pavlograd. And the final line of defense is being constructed in front of the Dnepr river and its cities.The construction of these lines indicate that Ukraine is preparing for the fall of Pokrovsk and with it the likely fall of the Donbass.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇸🇾 - The situation in the north of Syria this morning: The...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇸🇾⚡- Levant Forces have captured the city of Akhtarin, north Syria. 🇸🇾 - The situation in the north of Syria this morning:The Suqour al-Sham Brigades have entered the Turkish military stronghold of Kafr Jennah, fighting still ongoing. East of Azaz, the Suqour al-Sham Brigades have captured Joint Forces stronghold of Akhtarin.Media affiliated with the Sultan Murad Division (of the Joint Forces) claim they have captured Hawar Kilis, however there is no evidence of this yet. Their forces did however storm Suqour al-Sham Brigades headquarters in the north of the city last night.Although both sides were initially armed by Turkey, it seems Turkey has sided with the Sultan Murad Division and the rest of the Joint Forces. Large Turkish military convoys were seen moving towards Kafr Jennah last night as well as Turkish UAV strikes on Suqour al-Sham positions.The Suqour al-Sham Brigades are being supported by the US-backed Levant Forces. Essentially, the fighting has resulted in the end of the Syrian National Army (SNA), causing it to split - both sides were major subgroups of the SNA. Most of the smaller SNA units have remained neutral and have been calling for ceasefires, although some have sided with the Sultan Murad Division.Currently, the Turkish-backed Joint Forces are on the backfoot, with the US-backed Levant Forces gaining ground rapidly. There has been no infighting around Idlib, Hayat Tahrir al-Sham has remained largely neutral but has voiced support for the Suqour al-Sham Brigades. And the Turkistan Islamic Party, Ansar al-Tawhid and the Uyghurs mercenaries have also remained largely neutral.Suqour al-Sham affiliated media claims Turkey has begun recalling Sultan Murad mercenaries (mostly ethnic Azerbaijanis and Uyghurs) from Libya back to Syria as reinforcements. However, there is no evidence of this yet.Russia has taken the opportunity to bombard both sides while they fight each other, with constant airstrikes throughout the night and into the morning.

Russian forces have also entered… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- The Russian counteroffensive in the Kursk region continues.In the northern Kursk direction, Russian forces have recaptured Nizhniy Klin and Novoivanovka. Russian troops have already entered the first few houses of Leonidovo. Just south, Russian forces advanced to the north of Sverdilovka - it's possible Russia may perform a pincer on this town while having already entered from the south a month ago. Fighting has been ongoing in Sverdilovka for over a month now, without much success for the Russian troops.In the southern Kursk direction, the situation for the Ukrainians has deteriorated sharply. Russian forces have recaptured Russkaya Konopelka and Cherkasskaya Konopelka. More importantly, Russian troops have managed to enter Mikhailovka, a vital town for the Ukrainian defense to hold the city of Sudzha. A loss in Mikhailovka would be catastrophic for the Ukrainians.

The battle for the town lasted 3 weeks. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Liubimovka and Zeleniy Shlakh - north of the Kursk region, Russia. Russian troops have ended a three weeks battle for the town of Liubimovka and with that have also closed Olgovka's pocket. Russian forces have also entered the first few houses of Novoivanovka. In the center of the Kursk region, Russian forces have captured Novaya Sorochina completely bypassing the larger town of Pogrebki. It seems Russia is trying to encircle Pogrebki instead of fighting it head-on. Russia has captured an area of 54 sqkm, meanwhile Ukraine still holds 620 sqkm of territory in the Kursk region.
